snippet.title: Bullet: Surge Trailer 09/24
snippet.description:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/3021200/Bullet_Surge_Demo/
Go to the game’s Steam page now to play the demo and add the game to your Wishlist!

Bullet: Surge brings to life the fast-paced, high-pressure puzzle action of the tabletop game, optimized and remixed for an incredible real-time video-game experience. The result is more explosive than ever, and you’ll need to learn new tricks and stretch your wits to the limit against new challenges. Press your luck, test your skills, and use your heroine’s power and cunning to outplay your opponent!
